tests.text: You should create a new div element after your .medium element.
Your new div should have a class attribute set to daily-value small-text.
Your new div element should have a p element.

Your new p element should have a class attribute set to bold right.

description: Create a new div element below your .medium element. Give it a class attribute set to daily-value small-text. Within this new div, add a p element with the text % Daily Value *, and set the class attribute to bold right.
